snippet: The approval of a power-sharing government is an important building block, but hard work lies ahead for Prime Minister Abadi.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Iraqi Parliament's approval of new power-sharing government led by Prime Min Haider al-Abadi; warns of hard work ahead as Abadi tries to unify fractured country while working with United States to combat Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
lead_paragraph: The approval of a power-sharing government is an important building block, but hard work lies ahead for Prime Minister Abadi.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
